Description: Id values of larger than 16 digits are rounded up when displayed
The first character is removed from the name of a submitted category
Doesn't use the first available value for id, uses the highest existent value + 1 (or in the case where the highest value is 9223372036854775807, a random value)
500 error when passing in an id for a category that already exists, should fail more gracefully with a 400 error
500 error when an id higher than 9223372036854775807 is used, should fail more gracefully with a 400 error
Return id of the submitted category
No current limit on the number of characters that can be submitted for name
API documentation doesn't account for 400 response
Allows for deletion of categories that are in use (contain blog posts)
500 error when an id higher than 9223372036854775807 is used, should fail more gracefully with a 400 error
